name: 1979 REVOLUTION: Black Friday
blurb: Navigate the gritty world of a Revolution!  Survive the streets and be aware of who you can trust in a city under siege.

rewards.reward: No Reward

POWER TO THE PEOPLE

==============================

THANKS for joining the revolution!  Receive an exclusive DIGITAL WALLPAPER + Kickstarter backer digital UPDATES.
REVOLUTIONARY ============================== iOS edition + your name in CREDITS on the official website as a VISIONARY BACKER. (+all rewards from $1 pledge).
SECRET REVOLUTIONARY ============================== ANDROID edition + your name in CREDITS on the official website as a VISIONARY BACKER. (+all rewards from $1 pledge).
RENEGADE ============================== PC/MAC edition + your name in CREDITS on the official website as a VISIONARY BACKER. (+all rewards from $1 pledge).

VOTE for LEADERSHIP\r\n==============================\r\nVOTE on the look of a leading character and the name!  Plus DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK + early access to private BACKER community forum (including exclusive production updates).  (+ all rewards from $15 pledge).

VOTE for NEW LEADERSHIP ============================== PC/MAC/ANDROID & VOTE on the look of a leading character and the name! Plus DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK + early access to private BACKER community forum (including exclusive production updates). (+ all rewards from $20 pledge). PC/MAC/ANDROID EDITION.
RENEGADE TEE\r\n================ Perfect Holiday Coup!!
BIG PLAYER ============================== iOS/ANDROID PC/MAC chose one edition and original Revolution Graffiti Art playing cards! Designed by Mr. Phoenix. (+all rewards from $1 pledge)

FOOT SOLDIER\r\n==============================\r\niOS/ANDROID PC/MAC chose one edition and exclusive revolutionary socks - for the revolutionary in everyone!  Designed by Mr. Phoenix. (+all rewards from $1 pledge)

RECRUITER
==============================
Special Holiday Gift (one for me, one for you!) 
Get an additional iOS edition to give as a gift +  "Welcome to the REVOLUTION" digital holiday card to send along to your latest recruit. PLUS a digital download of the "MAKING of 1979" PDF (includes exclusive interviews with cast and team) + Digital copy of the SCRIPT!
(+all rewards from $25 pledge).

INTELLECTUAL\r\n==============================\r\nExclusive digital GRAPHIC NOVEL + Digital Concept ART BOOK (only available to Kickstarter backers) + Graffiti Kit (includes 1979 stencil and non-aerosol mini spray paint). (+all rewards from $25 pledge).

INFORMANT\r\n==============================\r\nExclusive 11x18 POSTER of the game (signed by the team) + SPECIAL EDITION 1979 GRAPHIC NOVEL COVER ART print (signed by our Concept Artist). (+ all awards from $75 pledge).

DOSSIER\r\n==============================\r\nGAME DOSSIER - A COLLECTION of DIGITAL BOOKS on the the MAKING of 1979. Plus backer EXCLUSIVE t-shirt (designed by concept artist). (+all awards from $125 pledge)

NOMADIC REVOLUTIONARY\r\n==============================\r\nBe the first to receive an early edition DIGITAL copy of Navid's not-yet-released 90 page GRAPHIC NOVEL "BEDOUIN" + a signed COVER ART print from BEDOUIN. (+all rewards from $250 pledge)

PHOTO JOURNALIST
==============================

Receive an original BLACK & WHITE poster size (11 x 18) photograph from the Revolution signed by MICHEL SETBOUN.  Plus join us via SKYPE for a production meetings. Plus become a BETA tester and give direct input on the making of the game. (+all rewards from $250 pledge)
VOICE OF THE PEOPLE\r\n==============================\r\nLet your words do the talking.  Be a VOICE in the game. (+all rewards from $125 pledge)

EYE IN THE SKY\r\n==============================\r\nSend us your picture and our amazing concept artist will create a CUSTOM REVOLUTIONARY Framable ART PIECE of YOU in the 1979 GRAPHIC NOVEL STYLE. (+all rewards from the $250 pledge)

POLITICAL ATTACHE\r\n==============================\r\nCONSULT with 1979 Revolution's award winning team to get feedback on your own game or transmedia project + be a BETA TESTER and give us your feedback. (+all rewards from $250 pledge).

24 HOUR SALE REBEL LEADER ============================== MARKED DOWN FROM $7500 TODAY! Leaders aren't born, they're made. Immortalize yourself, BE AN ACUTAL CHARACTER in the game!!! In both cinematics and graphic novel. Plus get your name in the game's credits as Associate Producer. (+all rewards from $2,500 pledge)

FACE OF THE REVOLUTION\r\n==============================\r\nGet your face in the revolution!  Send us your picture and and we will put your face IN THE GAME as part of THE WALL OF HEROES.  (+all rewards from $1000 pledge).

REVOLUTIONARY LEADER
==============================
We'll fly you out to iNK STORIES HQ where you will meet the team and attend the launch party.  You will play the entire game, give feedback to the team, then treat you to a home cooked Persian dinner cooked by Navid. (US, Canada only) Plus get your name in the game's credits as Associate Producer.
(+all rewards from $2,500 pledge)

REBEL LEADER\r\n==============================\r\nLeaders aren't born, they're made.  Immortalize yourself, BE AN ACTUAL CHARACTER in the game!!! In both cinematics and graphic novel.  Plus get your name in the game's credits as Associate Producer.  (+all rewards from $2,500 pledge)

NIGHT OF PAYNE
============================
We fly you to LA or NY where you will experience the city alongside the one and only real Max Payne; James McCaffrey + Navid Khonsari (+all rewards form $2,500 pledge)
+ Producer credit

BEARER OF GOOD NEWS\r\n==============================\r\nThat's what the name NAVID means.  We will fly you to LA or NY where you get to join us in the studio to watch Navid direct Navid Negahban, then afterwards join them for dinner. Plus get your name in the game's credits as a Producer (+all rewards from $2,500 pledge)

REVOLUTIONARY IN MOTION\r\n==============================\r\nCall to action. See yourself actually moving in the game.  We will fly you to NY or LA and get you suited up in the full MOTION CAPTURE suit where you will participate in the shoot!!! Plus get your name in the game's credits as Producer. (+all rewards from $2,500 pledge)

REVOLUTIONARY TEACHER\r\n==============================\r\nA special package for schools, educational groups and development houses. Navid will fly to you and give a one day seminar on the creation of 1979 and the lessons he's gleaned by working on the top Franchises like GTA.  You will be able to demo your games for Navid and get one-on-one feedback for up to 10 dev groups. Plus get your name in the game's credits as Producer. (+all rewards from $2,500 pledge)
